pages.text: Wa`da Allahi La Yukhlifu Allahu Wa`dahu Wa Lakinna 'Akthara An-Nasi La Ya`lamuna
Ya`lamuna Zahiraan Mina Al-Hayaati Ad-Dunya Wa Hum `Ani Al-'Akhirati Hum Ghafiluna
Awalam Yatafakkaru Fi 'Anfusihim Ma Khalaqa Allahu As-Samawati Wa Al-'Ara Wa Ma Baynahuma 'Illa Bil-Haqqi Wa 'Ajalin Musammaan Wa 'Inna Kathiraan Mina An-Nasi Biliqa'i Rabbihim Lakafiruna

Awalam Yasiru Fi Al-'Ari Fayanzuru Kayfa Kana `Aqibatu Al-Ladhina Min Qablihim Kanu 'Ashadda Minhum Quwatan Wa 'Atharu Al-'Ara Wa `Amaruha 'Akthara Mimma `Amaruha Wa Ja'at/hum Rusuluhum Bil-Bayyinati Fama Kana Allahu Liyazlimahum Wa Lakin Kanu 'Anfusahum Yazlimuna
Thumma Kana `Aqibata Al-Ladhina 'Asa'u As-Su'a 'An Kadhabu Bi'ayati Allahi Wa Kanu Biha Yastahzi'un
Allahu Yabda'u Al-Khalqa Thumma Yu`iduhu Thumma 'Ilayhi Turja`una
Wa Yawma Taqumu As-Sa`atu Yublisu Al-Mujrimuna
Wa Lam Yakun Lahum Min Shuraka'ihim Shufa`a'u Wa Kanu Bishuraka'ihim Kafirina
Wa Yawma Taqumu As-Sa`atu Yawma'idhin Yatafarraquna
Fa'amma Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati Fahum Fi Rawatin Yuhbaruna
